name: Nim_Abek
content:
Nim Abek, whose real name was Nim'abek'shy-wedell, was a male Kajain'sa'Nikto pirate who worked for the Black Sun Vigo Sprax.
Nim Abek began as a shipjacker in the Sisar Run until he stole a ship from Sprax's personal fleet in a fast, professional, and flawless way. Sprax appreciated the non-destructive method of stealing starships and arranged for Nim Abek to be captured just so he could offer him a job.
Nim Abek then went on to run Abek's Station, a small shadowport just before the Ac'fren Spur of the Sisar Run where he commanded over 100 pirates.
